title: CNN Exclusive: Mark Meadows' 2,319 text messages reveal Trump's inner circle communications before and after January 6 - CNN
content:
1. CNN Exclusive: Mark Meadows' 2,319 text messages reveal Trump's inner circle communications before and after January 6  CNN
  2. A Trump aide outlined how the then-president could redirect anger over the Capitol riot towards 'ANTIFA,' 'crazed leftists,' and the 'fake news media'  Yahoo News
  3. What Cassidy Hutchinson's testimony means for the Jan. 6 criminal case  The Washington Post
  4. READ: Text messages Sean Hannity, Marjorie Taylor Greene, Ivanka Trump and others sent to Mark Meadows  CNN
  5. Donald Trump Jr. urged Mark Meadows to get Trump to condemn January 6 riot  Business Insider
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: CNN has obtained 2,319 text messages that former President Donald Trump's White House chief of staff Mark Meadows sent and received between Election Day 2020 and President Joe Biden's January 20, 2021 inauguration.
